name: X to TSV
short_description:
The great thing about standards is that there are so many to choose from.

This script will focus on converting various file types found in bioinformatics into the easy-to-parse format of a simple, tab-delimited table.

While tables are not always the most efficient way to display information to humans, they are extremely easy to parse data from using scripts and programs. Tables are flexible, ubiquitous, and easy to manipulate. As such, they make the perfect "middle man" for transfer data between different formats.

The primary intent for this script is to aid in interoperability between bioinformatics tools.
summary: A script to convert various file types to tab separated value files.
